author: Heather Lindemann
title: Tower Cloud Announces Partnership with Total Server Solutions
text:
Tower Cloud and Total Server Solutions today announced a partnership that will increase capacity and improve routes throughout Atlanta, Georgia. The partnership is focused on Total Server Solution’s Buckhead Datacenter in the Buckhead business district, which establishes a connection point to an important Atlanta-based data center. The deal will not only provide additional growth in the long-term, but will also give Total Server Solutions more options for point-to-point circuits throughout the greater metro Atlanta area as well as much of the southeast. Tower Cloud’s network is perfectly suited for secure, private network connections back to data centers and Cloud Services within these types of facilities. “This partnership brings another key location to our network and allows customer of both companies to benefit from our unique service offerings,” said Joseph Patton, VP of Sales and Business Development, Tower Cloud. “It’s partners like Total Server Solutions that continue to help us grow our capacity and footprint.”
Atlanta-based Total Server Solutions customers will now have an access point to the entire Tower Cloud network, which includes a large South East footprint encompassing Florida, Georgia and within Alabama and South Carolina. Additionally it will allow business outside of the Atlanta metro area to connect to the Total Server Solutions blend of bandwidth providers. This strategic partnership is only the first step in a long-term technical partnership between the two companies.
“We are thrilled to be partnered with Tower Cloud as we increase bandwidth and continue to grow,” said Gary Simat, CEO, Total Server Solutions. “Our mission is to provide the most advanced and accessible hosted services – this partnership with Tower Cloud is another way we’re delivering that promise.”
About Total Server Solutions
Total Server Solutions was founded in 2005 with the goal of providing unsurpassed managed IT services. Total Server Solutions provides high-performance cloud computing, e-commerce hosting, dedicated servers, colocation, and custom services worldwide. Focusing entirely on the needs of their customers, the technical team at TSS brings to bear a depth of knowledge and skill unrivaled in the managed services space.
About Tower Cloud
Tower Cloud, Inc. is a leading provider of broadband transport services in the southeastern United States. Carriers and enterprises with high capacity demands select Tower Cloud when they need the highest quality network services, combined with guaranteed flexibility and customer support to achieve their immediate and evolving growth initiatives.
Tower Cloud’s unique approach to network infrastructure development provides customers with the experience of limitless capacity; effortlessly meeting the demands “always on devices” of communication platforms. Tower Cloud operates networks throughout Georgia, Florida, Alabama and South Carolina, serving major metro and rural markets with equal attention to speed and scalability. Headquartered in St. Petersburg, Florida, the company was founded in 2006 and has been three times named to the Inc. 500/5000 list of Fastest Growing Private Companies, and to their list of the top 20 fastest growing telecommunications companies in 2013 and 2014. For more information, visit http://www.towercloud.com .
